# AI Stock Prediction using LSTM + Attention

This project implements a hybrid deep learning model combining LSTM and Attention mechanisms to predict future stock prices based on historical financial data.

## Features
- Time Series Forecasting using LSTM
- Attention Mechanism for temporal importance
- Explainable AI using SHAP
- Deployment with Streamlit
- Real-time financial data from Yahoo Finance API

## Technologies
Python, TensorFlow, Streamlit, SHAP, yFinance

## Run the App
```bash
streamlit run app.py
